trans-unit.source: Provides constants for compatibility with the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Show" name="Show" href=""></xref> method.
In Visual Basic 6.0, the `Modal` parameter of the `Show` method was used to determine whether a form would be shown as a modal dialog box.

In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the `Modal` parameter is replaced by two different Show methods: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Show%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>.
These constants enable code that has been upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0 to continue to run without additional modification.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbModal" name="vbModal" href=""></xref>.
Equivalent to the Visual Basic 6.0 constant <xref uid="langword_csharp_vbModeless" name="vbModeless" href=""></xref>.
